info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A band of moderate to heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 900 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Greenwich to near Monroe and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Bennington, North Adams, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Adams, Williamstown, Pownal, Cambridge, Greenwich, Stamford, Readsboro, Florida, Gates, Hoosick, Lee, Pittstown, Northumberland, White Creek, Easton and Stillwater. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
